name: Last Alert
overview: In the near future, a cabal of 4 very evil, powerful men known as The Force is planning world domination through the use of a Super Weapon known and Indra. You are Guy Kazama, a general-purpose bad-ass soldier who can stop these guys. You must take out each of the conspirators one by one and destroy the Indra before it becomes fully operational. Players play as Guy Kazama and are sent out on multiple missions to fight the Force Project, an evil terrorist organization bent on ruling the world. As players rack up kills, experience points are earned that increase Kazama's rank.
